programme.title: Rusty Rivets BR: Episode 1
programme.desc: Rusty and Ruby discover an island where dinosaurs still exist, but they won't much longer unless they can stop the island's volcano from erupting!

programme.title: Rusty Rivets BR: Episode 3
programme.desc: Frankie Fritz mistakes a raptor egg for a cool gem, which he steals to bring back to Sparkton Hills; when Brawny's parts get mucked by a dust storm, Rusty and Ruby must find a way to get him across Dino Island to wash up in the steam vents.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets - S03E04-05
programme.sub-title: Frankie's Super Shoes; Rusty's Rapid Ralph Return
programme.desc: When Frankie's super shoes malfunction at the basketball championship, Rusty and Ruby save him with a basketball idea of their own; when Liam forgets to bring Ralph on vacation, Rusty and Ruby build the Super Jet 8000 to catch up with his plane.

Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger, who plans to use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom

programme.desc: Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the chili cook-off!

programme.title: Paw Patrol - S04E03
programme.desc: Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. Francois's trailer comes unhooked and all of his critters get loose.

programme.title: Paw Patrol - S04E04
programme.sub-title: Mission PAW: Quest for the Crown
programme.desc: Chase and the team get called to Barkingburg to keep an eye on the crown, but it quickly goes missing when they get distracted.

programme.title: TEDx Talks
programme.sub-title: A "Eureka" for Solar Energy | Bert Conings | TEDxUHasselt
programme.desc: Explore the promise of solar energy with Dr. Conings: Learn how cutting-edge perovskite materials revolutionize global solar power

programme.title: Heartbeat Episode 24
programme.desc: Heartbeat Episode 24

programme.title: Heartbeat Episode 25
programme.desc: Heartbeat Episode 25

programme.title: Heartbeat Episode 26
programme.desc: Rüzgar goes to Bosnia after losing the woman he loves in a car crash two years ago, to run away from everything and everyone but mostly his memories.. He doesn’t make contact with anyone for two years, including his family. His uncle Kemaç and his mother Vahide who is the owner of a major corporation in Turkey, find Ruzgar after long efforts. So Kemal goes to Bosnia to bring Rüzgar back. But Rüzgar is still heartbroken. He can’t live like this so he runs away after a family dinner without telling anyone. He finds himself in Foça after meeting with a taxi driver. Meanwhile Zeynep is about to marry her childhood love Kutay. There’s only a week until the wedding, while the preparations continue Zeynep learns that she was cheated on. She goes to Foça to her most dear grandpa Muammer and aunt Ayla. However, she faints just before she could get there, right in front of Rüzgar’s house. She hides her true identity from everyone except Rüzgar. Afterwards, Zeynep is forced to see Kutay as her best friend Hande is getting married. Sibel, Başak and Hande think up a plan. But they need Rüzgar to make this plan work. Rüzgar can’t say no to this after hearing what happened to Zeynep. So a game of hearts begins between Zeynep and Rüzgar.

programme.title: Accidents Caught on Camera
programme.desc: Accidents Caught on Camera

programme.title: Shamba Shape Up Series 1 - Ep 10
programme.desc: On today's shamba shape up we learn how to make Silage, Planting Bananas and sweet potatoes, the importance of using gutters and learn the Push-Pull method for Napier grass and Maize plant.

programme.title: Shamba Shape Up Series 1 - Ep 11
programme.sub-title: Cow Care, Tea Planting, Solar Power
programme.desc: We visit christine in her shamba in Kakamega town, we learn proper care for cows, have a good tea plantation, get an energy conserving jiko and learn how solar power is important.

programme.title: Shamba Shape Up Series 1 - Ep 12
programme.desc: We learn to tell the difference between genuine and fake chemicals, important minerals for cows, running a profitable farm, making compost, fruits and much more.

programme.title: Shamba Shape Up Series 1 - Ep 13
programme.sub-title: Cow Care, Irrigation and Bee Keeping
programme.desc: We revisit the shambas to see if any of the lessons have been continued! We learn about irrigation, cow care, potatoes and honey bees.

programme.title: Shamba Shape Up Series 1 - Ep 14
programme.sub-title: Coffee, Maize, Push & pull and Passion fruits
programme.desc: We’re in Walukoto village in Mayuge and we’re visiting Hussein Buyiima and his family on their farm. This is a very close-knit family!

programme.title: Taken
programme.desc: Brian Mills must rely on his skills as a former CIA operative to rescue his teenage daughter and her friend who have been abducted by human traffickers for sexual slavery while on a trip to Paris.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: Captain Artemis and her group of soldiers are pulled into a world where dangerous monsters and humans co-exist. Grappled by danger, they must find a way to escape with help from a mysterious hunter.

programme.title: Paternity Court
programme.sub-title: Years of Denial, But Is He the Father?
programme.desc: 1. Williams v. Jackson - Exhausted from years of denial, a Georgia woman brings her husband to court to demand he steps up as the father to her two-year-old son.

programme.title: Paternity Court
programme.sub-title: Women Wants to Prove Her Child is Not a Product of Infidelity
programme.desc: 1. Cowart v. James - A Kentucky woman wants to prove that her 9-month-old son is not a product of infidelity.

programme.title: Paternity Court
programme.desc: 1. Connally v. Harrison: A Washington, D.C. woman wants to prove that her ex is the biological father of her daughter while her daughter hopes another man is her dad.

programme.title: Superbook - The Ten Commandments
programme.desc: The Quantum family along with Joy and Gizmo are enjoying a family camp out when Chris secretly decides it'll be more adventurous to ignore the rules laid down by his parents and the park ranger. His flagrant disregard gets him, Gizmo and Joy trapped in a dark cave. SUPERBOOK whisks the kids back to a time when the Israelites were facing their own challenges regarding rules and laws.

programme.title: God's Not Dead
programme.desc: After he refuses to disavow his faith, a devout Christian student (Shane Harper) must prove the existence of God or else his college philosophy professor (Kevin Sorbo) will fail him.

programme.title: Some Mothers Do 'Ave 'Em: Season 1, Episode 4
programme.sub-title: Have a Break, Take a Husband
programme.desc: To make up for a disastrous first honeymoon, Frank and Betty are off to the seaside, and all seems to be going well until they reach the hotel.

programme.title: TED Talk
programme.sub-title: We should all be feminists Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
programme.desc: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie a renowned Nigerian novelist was born in Nigeria in 1977. She grew up in the university town of Nsukka, Enugu State where she attended primary and secondary schools, and briefly studied Medicine and Pharmacy. She then moved to the United States to attend college, graduating summa cum laude from Eastern Connecticut State University with a major in Communication and a minor in Political Science. She holds a Masters degree in Creative Writing from Johns Hopkins and a Masters degree in African Studies from Yale University. She was a 2005-2006 Hodder Fellow at Princeton, where she taught introductory fiction. Chimamanda is the author of Half of a Yellow Sun, which won the 2007 Orange Prize For Fiction; and Purple Hibiscus, which won the 2005 Best First Book Commonwealth Writers' Prize and the 2004 Debut Fiction Hurston/Wright Legacy Award. In 2009, her collection of short stories, The Thing around Your Neck was published. She was named one of the twenty most important fiction writers today under 40 years old by The New Yorker and was recently the guest speaker at the 2012 annual commonwealth lecture. She featured in the April 2012 edition of Time Magazine, celebrated as one of the 100 Most Influential People in the World. She currently divides her time between the United States and Nigeria.

programme.title: Music
Music
programme.desc: Music
African Music

programme.title: Faces Of Africa
programme.sub-title: Haile Selassie: The Pillar of a Modern Ethiopia, part 1 & 2
programme.desc: Though he died almost four decades ago, Haile Selassie's legacy remains strong and valid.

programme.title: The List
programme.desc: By the age of 12, Jack Stone had experienced more life grit than most adults. In desperation, he decides to grab the controls, make a list as his roadmap and set out to accomplish life his way. Fifteen years of life on the street and clawing up from the bottom later, we find Jack as a successful lawyer. He's done well on his own, crossed a lot off his list and added more. But, he hasn't factored God into the plan. God hasn't seemed to be around in the past... Can Jack trust Him with the future? As life continues to take its toll and tragedies strike, will Jack relinquish the power of his list in order to gain all he's ever wanted?
